page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE.....
page.content: At seven o'clock I get up, make my bed and draw back my curtains.I go down stairs and watch television until eight o'clock,when I get washed and dressed.Before I go to school I take the dog to my Grandad's. It is a Monday today,so I take my swimming kit to school with me.At nine o'clock the school bell goes and I go into school with my friends.Mr. Eames calls the register and we go into assembly for songs,a story and prayers.After assembly we go back to the classroom and on the board is a list of work that we must finish before the end of school.Just before playtime, group one swimmers go swimming to Atherstone.We have a small pool at school which was built by the Parent's Association, but the top two classes go to the larger pool using the school mini bus.
